article_title: How You Can Help: One Girl's Drive to Force a Town to Drop Racist Mascot

article_metadata.description: How can we help in an effort to change the mascot of a North Haven (Conn.) high school away from the “Indians”? An alumnus, Talia Gallagher, who is now a student at Clark University in Worcester, Mass.
